title: A Month's Worth of Quick and Easy Dinners
description: We've put together an entire month's worth of 5-star recipes, featuring chicken, pork, beef, seafood, and pasta dishes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE A Month's Worth of Quick and Easy Dinners By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on May 6, 2020 Close Credits: KGora For anyone who's ever been stumped about what to make for dinner, here's one for you. We've put together an entire month's worth of five-star recipes, featuring chicken, pork, beef, seafood, and pasta dishes. And best of all, these top-rated recipes are quick and easy; most are ready in less than 40 minutes! 01 of 32 Simple Lemon Herb Chicken View Recipe Save Ready in about 25 minutes. "Loved this recipe for its simplicity and flavor. Any leftover chicken makes an AMAZING chicken salad. Delicious." — SULLIVANBZ 02 of 32 BBQ Chicken Chopped Salad View Recipe Save Krista Ready in 25 minutes. "Super delicious and so easy to make — each person gets just the ingredients they want on their salad," Jasmine Couillard says. Check out our collection of Quick and Easy Chicken Dinner Recipes. 03 of 32 Sesame Grilled Salmon View Recipe Save Nicolette Ready in about 25 minutes. "Delicious grilled salmon. A very flavorful main dish. Great when served with grilled yellow bell peppers, green beans, and wild rice with herbs," Emily says. 04 of 32 One Pan Orecchiette Pasta View Recipe Save Linda T Ready in 40 minutes. "Super easy, costs pennies, and requires a bare minimum of kitchen equipment. This delicious orecchiette pasta recipe only has a handful of ingredients, is very cheap to make, and most importantly: only uses one pan," Chef John says. Explore our collection of Quick and Easy Pasta Dinner Recipes 05 of 32 Chicken Tortilla Soup IV View Recipe Save ashleigh9 Ready in about 30 minutes. "Foolproof recipe. I've made it many times, with various small changes. I often use leftover precooked chicken, so it goes really fast. Also works great in the crock-pot, just throw everything in and cook on high for a few hours," says Shawni. 06 of 32 Pork Medallions with Balsamic Vinegar and Capers View Recipe Save LaurenM Ready in 25 minutes. "This is perfect — and so easy. In truth, it took me longer to get a decent photo of it than it did to make it." — SunnyByrd Take a peek at our Quick and Easy Pork Dinner Recipes. 07 of 32 Sloppy Joe Casserole View Recipe Save Preps in 15 minutes. "Huge hit! Added chili powder for a little extra spice. I actually had all the ingredients at home. Great recipe and fun to make," Kyle says. 08 of 32 Soy and Honey Pork Chops View Recipe Save Melissa Goff Ready in 30 minutes. "What a wonderful meal. The basting sauce is amazing. Definitely put the onions on the grill. Will make this again and again." — JAN CAN COOK 09 of 32 Chicken Breasts in Caper Cream Sauce View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine Ready in 20 minutes. "This dish was very delicious. I loved it because it was simple to make and yet the flavor was to die for! I added a little more cream for extra sauce." — southernstyle 10 of 32 Beef Enchiladas II View Recipe Save Tanya Stevens "What I really love about this recipe is the delicious simplicity of it! Not too many ingredients, but very tasty." — KITCHEN DOLLY 11 of 32 Grandma's Famous Salmon Cakes View Recipe Save Rock_lobster Ready in 30 minutes."This is a recipe for my grandmother's famous salmon cakes. It is a family recipe that has been passed down through generations. Serve with macaroni and cheese or any other type of side dish." — JESS4UANDME 12 of 32 Modenese Pork Chops View Recipe Save SunnyByrd Ready in 40 minutes. "This was simple and had great flavor. I made it with rice and drizzled the extra sauce over it. Turned out great," Theresa says. 13 of 32 Tuna Lime Tostadas View Recipe Save Caroline C Ready in about 10 minutes. "Great recipe and virtually zero prep-work/time! No changes necessary but can be easily modified for different diets/tastes." — D.C. Flint 14 of 32 Ham Tetrazzini View Recipe Save Simple Mom Ready in 30 minutes. "A great quickie for a weeknight. Hubby successfully cooked this by himself and the kids gobbled it up. I'll definitely 'let' him make it again!" — SODAFIZZ 15 of 32 Chicken Fiesta Salad View Recipe Save Katrina Schultz Ready in 40 minutes. "This is the best chicken salad I have ever had. It is very easy and really filling. A great summertime salad that is also low fat!" — PATTON0626 16 of 32 Ground Beef and Cabbage View Recipe Save Laguna Lala Ready in 15 minutes. "This so easy, very comforting, and affordable! Turned out great." — GabbrielleLovesToCook Explore our collection of Quick and Easy Beef Dinner Recipes. 17 of 32 Pan-Roasted Chicken Breasts View Recipe Save KGora Ready in about 20 minutes. "This is a delicious pan sauce for chicken! Its piquant flavor enhances the fresh herbs used on the chicken." — rickm28inil 18 of 32 Amatriciana View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen Ready in 35 minutes. "Delicioso! Definitely a five-star meal! I grew up on pasta and red sauce. My grandfather never made a red sauce like this!" — mcqueenbee 19 of 32 Grilled Cod with Spinach and Tomatoes View Recipe Save KGora Ready in 20 minutes. "Great, tasty, and oh-so-simple recipe! Excellent choice for a weeknight! I followed the recipe, except doubled the fresh spinach and used fresh minced garlic." — lisasayegh Check out our collection of Quick and Easy Seafood Dinner Recipes. 20 of 32 Garlic Chicken Stir Fry View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine Ready in about 30 minutes. "This is a great recipe. I couldn't believe how well it turned out. One tip: Prepare (chop, measure, mix) everything before you turn on the heat. Once you start cooking, you won't have time to do anything else," Lonnie says. 21 of 32 Hamburger Steak with Onions and Gravy View Recipe Save naples34102 Ready in 40 minutes. "These were fantastic! I added some mushrooms and served them with hot buttered noodles." — BABYPHAT55 22 of 32 Quick Chicken And Wine View Recipe Save sjc5087 Ready in 25 minutes. "Very good and very easy. It has a 'high-end' flavor for something so simple to make. I added some Italian seasoning to the flour before dredging and the store had no nice lemons so I substituted white balsamic vinegar which worked beautifully," Karen Dawn says. 23 of 32 Super Simple Salmon View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine Ready in 15 minutes. "I love the simplicity and great taste of this recipe. This makes me want to cook salmon more often." — Secret Chef 24 of 32 Sirloin Tips and Mushrooms View Recipe Save LatinaCook Preps in 15 minutes. "Absolutely, positively great. I dusted the beef with flour, used baby bella mushrooms, and the sauce consistency was just perfect. This is a recipe I will make again and again." — JONIKAYE 25 of 32 Mediterranean Chicken View Recipe Save Mediterranean Chicken Ready in about 20 minutes. "This chicken dish turned out super delicious! My house smelled like a restaurant while I was cooking," Lisa says. 26 of 32 Pork Chops with Fresh Tomato, Onion, Garlic, and Feta View Recipe Save Marisa R. Ready in 35 minutes. "Wonderful! What a great amount of taste with a minimum of work. The balsamic blended so well with the garlic, onion, and tomatoes. And the feta on top was like icing on the cake!" — MOONNOODLE 27 of 32 Creamy Chicken Marsala View Recipe Save fabeverydayblog Ready in 20 minutes. "Super-easy take on Chicken Marsala, which is probably my family's favorite meal. Quick and yummy. I served over egg noodles." — arcticflygirl 28 of 32 Quick Beef Stir-Fry View Recipe Save Schweebz Ready in 25 minutes. "Quick, healthy-ish meal that looks and tastes like a fancy one. Great for students (like me) because we can switch out or add any veggies or meat that we have in the fridge. Very hard to mess up," Savanna Endicott says. 29 of 32 Tomato Basil Salmon View Recipe Save CookinBug Ready in 30 minutes. "Fab dish. A new favorite way to make salmon. Added some sun-dried tomatoes, which were very yum." — DaniellaLiberty 30 of 32 Pan-Seared Chicken Breasts with Shallots View Recipe Save Deb C Ready in 35 minutes. "I felt like a real chef with this one. The chicken was golden and beautiful.The shallots, wine, and some mushrooms were all a great combination of flavors!" — BreaBren 31 of 32 Cha Cha's White Chicken Chili View Recipe Save Marisa R. Ready in about 30 minutes. "This chili was perfect -- super easy to make and delicious." — WINEANDCHEESE Check out our complete collection of Quick and Easy Dinner Recipes. 32 of 32 More Quick Dinner Ideas Quick and Easy Teriyaki Beef Stir-Fry. fabeveryday One-Pot Broccoli Main Dishes for Easy, Complete Meals Freezer-Friendly Dinners the Whole Family Will Love Complete Menus for 30-Minute Meals Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Quick and Easy Main Dishes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
